did.unittitle: Wagner Free Institute of Science collection of reproductions of Charles R. Knight prehistoric animal illustrations

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of printed illustrations by Charles R. Knight. The pictures are framed in glass, with taped borders. Most of the images are artistic reconstructions of prehistoric animals, as conceived from the fossil record. Subjects include woolly mammoths, American mastodon, early man, horse evolution, a stegosaurus, a Devonian forest scene, kangaroos, and an unattributed drawing labeled "Transition from Sharks to Rays."
